title: sort
desc: sort a matrix/map based on axis and given columns.

input.name: data
input.description: array of maps to be combines into one

params.name: nilPosition
params.description: Puts Nils at the beginning if first; last puts Nils at the end.

params.name: by
params.description: sort by elements: 1. all are string -> conlumn label, 2. all are int (0 means first column) -> column number
